value:
So, this land is still known as the
Kingdom of Askr, is it? I take pride
in that—but it can be confusing.

Mine is a world that connects to all
others. Where would you like to go?

Ash is like a daughter to me. Her
drive to help people is a precious
quality I hold dear.

I imagine each world connected to
all others... If the people could find
a way to cooperate—just think of it.

I've come to see you are something
interesting indeed. Perhaps we could
get to know each other better...$k$pWould you have the time to speak
with me, $Nu?

Hello! Here you are, in light of your
bond with $Nf!

Together, no world in existence
is beyond our reach.

What sort of world shall
I go to next? I wonder...
Oh! My, my...

Thank you! I am pleased to receive
such a gift.

Hello! I am Askr. To be summoned is
to see a new world, so I am pleased
indeed! I look forward to our travels.

Mortals are dear to me. I wish to
learn of them and embrace the
wonderful variety of their ways...$k$pTheir lives, short as they may be,
burn with an intense brilliance.
I would like to help them shine.$k$pThat is why I made my contract
with Líf, and why Embla contracted
with Thrasir...$k$pThese ties live on, even today,
within Alfonse, Zacharias, and
others of their lines.$k$pIt all pleases me endlessly, and
I hope only to protect that brilliant
light of theirs.
This path must open.
You can do better.
Could we not speak?
May this bring peace!
Violence begets nothing…
Speaking with you is a pleasure. I foresee us growing quite close indeed.
Curious about me, are you? Delightful.
I do wish Embla and I could make peace. She, however, feels very differently...
How has Ash been doing? She takes her work very seriously, you know.
I do not comport myself as you expect of a god? But gods are no more special than any mortal.
A world of companionship, where all gaps between people can be bridged. That is my ideal.
I believe our worlds will only continue to grow closer.
I agree.
Which path to take...
The unknown beckons!
